ResourceHeader.ResourceName: Van Allen Probe A Electric and Magnetic Field Instrument Suite and Integrated Science (EMFISIS) Density and other Parameters derived by digitizing Traces on Spectrograms, Level 4 (L4), 0.5 s Data

RevisionEvent.Note: Only known prior ReleaseDate of the metadata

Added DOI and PublicationInfo minted by LFB, updated InformationURL URLs as needed, updated the SPDF MetadataContact Person to Robert M. Candey, metadata updated to SPASE 2.4.1, reviewed by LFB 20220818

ResourceHeader.Description: Van Allen Probe A, Electric and Magnetic Field Instrument Suite and Integrated Science, EMFISIS, derived Density and other Parameters inferred by digitizing Traces on Spectrograms. The EMFISIS Waves Instrument provides a Measure of the Frequency of the Upper Hybrid Resonance Band thereby providing an accurate Determination of the Electron Density. The Electron Density is most easily and accurately measured by Means of Resonances and Cutoffs in the Wave Spectrum rather than Particle Detector Measurements which are subject to Spacecraft Charging and other complicating Factors.

Parameter.Name: Epoch Time
Parameter.Caveats: This Parameter exhibits an increasing Monotonic Progression.

Parameter.Name: Digitized Frequency Point
Parameter.Set: Time Series defined by using: EPOCH
Parameter.Description: Digitized Frequency Point, interpreted by using the Value of the Digitization Parameter, digi_type

Parameter.Name: Magnetic Field Magnitude
Parameter.Set: Time Series defined by using: EPOCH
Parameter.Description: Magnetic Field Magnitude, used to infer the Electron Cyclotron Frequency, fce

Parameter.Name: Electron Cyclotron Frequency
Parameter.Set: Time Series defined by using: EPOCH

Parameter.Name: Electron Plasma Frequency
Parameter.Set: Time Series defined by using: EPOCH

Parameter.Name: Ratio of Electron Plasma Oscillation Frequencies
Parameter.Set: Time Series defined by using: EPOCH
Parameter.Description: Ratio of Electron Plasma Oscillation Frequencies, the Electron Plasma Frequency, fpe, divided by the Electron Cyclotron Frequency, fce

Parameter.Name: Upper Hybrid Resonance Frequency
Parameter.Set: Time Series defined by using: EPOCH

Parameter.Name: Electron Density
Parameter.Set: Time Series defined by using: EPOCH
Parameter.Description: Electron Density, inferred from the Spectrogram

Parameter.Name: Digitization Type
Parameter.Set: Time Series defined by using: EPOCH
Parameter.Description: There are two Digitization Type Values: 'fuh' denotes that the Upper Hybrid Resonance Frequency, fuh, was digitized, or 'fpe' denotes that the Electron Plasma Frequency, fpe, was digitized by using Cutoffs. The digi_type Parameter is not for plotting.
